name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior SOC Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in incident management and threat hunting in high-performance environments within the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **SIEM**, **Splunk**, **EDR**, **XDR**, and advanced threat detection tools such as **CrowdStrike** and **SentinelOne**. I also have a strong command of network protocols, notably **TCP/IP**, and cloud services expertise in **AWS** and **Azure**.

I excel in developing robust security solutions that align with compliance standards including NIST, and my background in full-stack development using **Python**, along with frameworks like **Django** and **FastAPI**, enables seamless integration between security and application stacks. I am knowledgeable in implementing SOAR strategies, and my experience with CI/CD automation enhances incident response workflows. I bring excellent communication, teamwork, and adaptability skills to effectively collaborate and lead within diverse teams. My leadership has driven the development of security architectures that prioritize real-time data processing and analytics.
